name: @condict/ipa
description: IPA (international phonetic alphabet) tables and search functions.
author: Alice Heurlin <alice.s.heurlin@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:data && npm run build:main
scripts.build:main: cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel src --out-dir lib && npm run copyData
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm install && npm run clean && npm run build
